Articles.Content:
Often the credits go by unwatched. This time I watched the credits for KSP a second time. First was back in 0.23. Now this time i notice some interesting concept art. It looks like a crane to lift and piece together your rocket.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I've built a rocket on the lawn of KSP before (don't have pics, unfortunately).

It's an interesting concept. But not something viable.

It COULD make an interesting part of a spinoff 2D KSP mobile game, I'm sure.
